problem1

Class Games

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem1.Games
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game

    public class Games
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game
    Creates different types of games and its respective decks. Euchre, Pinochle and Vegas Blackjack are the games that can be created.
    Author:
    meghna
